SELECT COM.C_CODCOM AS CO_CODIGOCOMUNA, COM.T_SIGLA AS CO_SIGLA, COM.T_NOMBRE AS CO_NOMBRE, COM.C_CODCIU AS CO_CODIGOCIUDAD,
CIU.C_CODCIU AS C_CODIGOCIUDAD, CIU.T_SIGLA AS C_SIGLA, CIU.T_NOMBRE AS C_NOMBRE, CIU.C_CODREG AS C_CODIGOREGION,
REG.C_CODREG AS R_CODIGOREGION, REG.T_SIGLA AS R_SIGLA, REG.T_NOMBRE AS R_NOMBRE, REG.T_IDENT AS R_IDENTIFICACION, REG.C_CODPAIS AS R_CODIGOPAIS,
PAIS.C_CODPAIS AS P_CODIGOPAIS, PAIS.T_SIGLA AS P_SIGLA, PAIS.T_ABREV AS P_ABREVIACION, PAIS.T_NOMBRE AS P_NOMBRE
FROM AN_COMUNA COM INNER JOIN AN_CIUDAD CIU ON COM.C_CODCIU = CIU.C_CODCIU INNER JOIN AN_REGION REG ON CIU.C_CODREG = REG.C_CODREG INNER JOIN AN_PAIS PAIS ON REG.C_CODPAIS = PAIS.C_CODPAIS
WHERE COM.C_CODCOM = #{codigoComuna}

SELECT CA.C_TIPCATAL AS C_CODIGO, CA.T_DESCRIPCION AS C_VALOR
FROM AN_CATALOGO CA
WHERE CA.C_CATALOGO = #{tipoCatalogo} AND CA.C_TIPCATAL = #{key} AND CA.T_VIGENTE = 'S'

SELECT MAIL.C_CODMAIL AS M_CODMAIL, MAIL.T_FROM AS M_FROM, MAIL.T_TO AS M_TO, MAIL.T_CC AS M_CC, MAIL.T_CCO AS M_CCO, MAIL.T_ASUNTO AS M_ASUNTO, MAIL.T_MAIL AS M_MENSAJE FROM AN_MAILREPORT MAIL WHERE MAIL.C_CODMAIL = #{codigoMail}
SELECT to_char(now(), 'dd-MM-yyyy') AS FECHAACTUAL, to_char(now(), 'hh24:mi:ss') AS HORAACTUAL
